synopsis.p: Writes the corpus in relp format.

description.p: writes the corpus into in relp format.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: sentenceRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the parsed sentence in the dependency relation.

param-doc.name: linkageNumberFeature
param-doc.p: Feature containing the linkage number to which a dependency belongs.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: This expression is evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as the context element, the module will process the document only if the result is true.

param-doc.name: outFile
param-doc.p: File where to write the dependencies.

param-doc.name: documentFilter
param-doc.p: Only process document that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: sectionFilter
param-doc.p: Process only sections that satisfy this filter.

param-doc.name: headRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the head word.

param-doc.name: wordLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing word annotations.

param-doc.name: dependentRole
param-doc.p: Name of the role of the dependent word.

param-doc.name: pmid
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the document as context. The result is the identifier of the document.

param-doc.name: wordForm
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the word element as context. The result is the surface form of the word.

param-doc.name: lemmaForm
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the word element as context. The result is the lemma of the word.

param-doc.name: headForm
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the dependency head element as context. The result is the surface form of the head.

param-doc.name: dependentForm
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a string with the dependency dependent element as context. The result is the surface form of the dependent.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
